attributes.action: Build a skatepark in the mile oak/Portslade area.
attributes.background: There are not many local skatepark around. The closest one is a hassle to get to. If we get 10,000 signatures then the kids/adults of Portslade and Hove can enjoy an easy to get to skatepark.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The building of a skate park is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://present.brighton-hove.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx
